q_en: Which cutting tasks have been completed by Master Cutters?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Master Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group with the name "Master Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, op.product_id, op.number FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.working_group_id = '3' AND ct.status = 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the details of completed cutting tasks for the working group "Master Cutters"
